schemaDescription:
file_path: string: The full stage path to the file (e.g., "@DATABASE.SCHEMA.STAGE/path/to/file.csv"
or "DATABASE.SCHEMA.STAGE/path/to/file.csv")
target_folder: string: Local folder to download the file to (default: current working directory)
metadata.actionSignature: action/args: "warehouse: Secret, file_path: str, target_folder: str=''"
